funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.com

Class Bluetooth

  • java.lang.Object
    • funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.com.Bluetooth
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BluetoothAndroid, BluetoothJava

    public abstract class Bluetooth
extends java.lang.Object
    Interface that defines required Bluetooth functionality of implementing class

    Used to abstract away the different approaches for Bluetooth communication on Android and regular old Java.

        Send a string of char's over BT (UTF-8 Encoding)
        Parameters:
        send - - String to send over BT
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an exception is thrown when attempting to write to the stream, or if Bluetooth is not enabled/available
